description:
Tsukiko-hime and Harumi are put to sleep by a spirit and imprisoned in the world of dreams. Enma-kun and the others try everything they can think of to try and wake them up, but all to no avail... and eventually get sent into the world of dreams themselves. But the world of dreams isn`t as bad as Enma-kun originally thought - he can do whatever he wants and everything he wants is there!
But back in the real world, another spirit is coming for their sleeping bodies!
Source: Official Site

titles.title: Anta Ano Ko no Yume na no sa
あんたあの子の夢なのさ
